Reviews.Title: very useful
Reviews.Author: sondous
Reviews.Content: Very cute ,both of my sim cards work perfectly.The white color of the phone makes it so special ,love it so far.

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Alexander
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone because of its dual simcard. It works fine in USA using Tmobile and in Colombia and Panama with the different brands. The thing I dislike of the phone is that the ring tone is not strong enough so if one doesnt has it close, one may not hear it.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT PHONE
Reviews.Author: Ricardo Imaña
Reviews.Content: MY GF USES THIS PHONE FOR HER JOB SINCE SHE HAS TWO CELLPHONE NUMBERS. IS IS A GREAT BUY BEING A ORIGINAL TWO CHIP CELLPHONE, AND NOT ONE OF THOSE CHINESE KNOCKOFFS.

Reviews.Title: Simple, I practise but reliable, good telephone
Reviews.Author: Yorgenes Martinez
Reviews.Content: Buy it makes little him this telephone, though I am in venezuela and the telephone this one in English, does not stop being a good telephone, I have to realize an update of language and list, all the applications the entendere and pus to give him the suitable use, it possesses double line, for what I use a local line of chip and another cellular mobile without ningun problem, is not super intelligently but very usefully, I recommend it and especially to this seller (WirelessEverything)

ProductInfo.Features:
Dual Sim, Two Sim Card Slot, Both Sim Card Operates At Quadband Mode and Dual Stand By Mode
1.3 MP camera,optical track pad,takes memory card,powerful MP3 player with MP4 video player.
HAS 3.5 MM head phone jack for easily use of your high quality haedphone
Social Network Service Like Face Book Is Intrigated.
Easy to send SMS,MMS AND Email
